item.title: “… And so what I like to do is go on iTunes and buy movies that are old. Or I’ll go on iTunes and just, like, buy the whole ‘Sopranos’ series, and then my husband will be like, ‘You literally can watch that for free on HBO Max.’”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Aubrey Plaza says streaming services make her “angry”
“I was trying to watch ‘Top Chef’ Season 20. Couldn’t figure out how to f-cking get Hulu + Live. I give up! I can’t. I just can’t...”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Sofia Coppola will release her first book this Fall.
It will cover the entirety of her singular and influential career in film. Constructed from her personal collection of photographs & ephemera, reference collages, annotated scripts, and unseen behind the scenes documentation.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
“I’m at an age now where everything I try, I want it to matter for me. It always did, but even more so now because we’re just running out of time.” — Martin Scorsese.
http://nyti.ms/3WqCPRi
item.author: FilmUpdates
